name: Creamy Coleslaw
description: When it comes to capturing the essence of summer, nothing hits the spot quite like coleslaw. This one delivers a rich, creamy, irresistible dressing that will earn you major bragging rights as the ultimate slaw aficionado at the next get-together or backyard BBQ. Getting a full serving of veggies has never tasted so good!

ingredients.name: Coleslaw Dressing Mix or Caesar Dressing Mix

preparation:
1. In large bowl, stir together mayonnaise, yogurt, dressing mix, and vinegar.
  2. Using the 4-in-1 Mandoline, thinly slice cabbage (about 10 cups) and carrots.
  3. Add cabbage and carrot to bowl; stir to combine. Salad will keep well, refrigerated, up to 3 days.
tips: One Coleslaw Dressing Mix recipe makes 1 cup coleslaw dressing.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 4 oz (112 g) of chicken and 1⁄2 cup potato salad.
